methods.Synopsis: Event shows that an ad has been requested

parameters.Name: req_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the ad request.  If not provided, one will be generated

parameters.Name: req_delay_ms
parameters.Description: The number of milliseconds from when the script tried to request to when it was able to request (e.g. if the client was offline for some period of time)

parameters.Name: req_t
parameters.Description: The number of milliseconds before the ad request was requested

parameters.Name: req_api_ms
parameters.Description: The number of ms it took for the request API to be processed from the client

parameters.Name: req_view
parameters.Description: Whether or not the request was in view at request time

parameters.Name: req_view_pix
parameters.Description: Number of pixels of the ad that was in view at request time

parameters.Name: req_url_blind
parameters.Description: Whether we could directly see the URL from the web page

parameters.Name: campaign_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the campaign

parameters.Name: ad_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the ad creative

parameters.Name: label
parameters.Description: User defined label that helps classify this ad request

parameters.Name: slot_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the ad slot

parameters.Name: slot_x
parameters.Description: The X position of the ad slot at the time of the request

parameters.Name: slot_y
parameters.Description: The Y position of the ad slot at the time of the request

parameters.Name: slot_w
parameters.Description: The width of the ad slot

parameters.Name: slot_h
parameters.Description: The height of the ad slot

parameters.Name: user_hash
parameters.Description: Global user ID which is a hash of the email address

parameters.Name: user_id
parameters.Description: Global user ID, generated by either the device or Ad.js, stored in local storage

parameters.Name: user_vis
parameters.Description: Total number of visits that this user has made to sites with Ad.js

parameters.Name: user_page_vw
parameters.Description: Total number of page views (with Ad.js ads on them) that this user has seen

parameters.Name: user_ad_req
parameters.Description: Total number of Ad.js ads that this user has requested

parameters.Name: user_ad_vw
parameters.Description: Total number of Ad.js ads that this user has viewed

parameters.Name: user_ad_vw_eng
parameters.Description: Total number of Ad.js ads that this user has viewed while engaged

parameters.Name: user_ad_clk
parameters.Description: Total number of Ad.js ads that this user has clicked

parameters.Name: site_hash
parameters.Description: Site User ID - hash of site username or unique ID

parameters.Name: site_id
parameters.Description: Site user ID, generated by either the device or Ad.js, stored in local storage

parameters.Name: site_vis
parameters.Description: Total number of visits that this user has made to this site

parameters.Name: site_page_vw
parameters.Description: Total number of page views on this site that this user has seen

parameters.Name: site_ad_req
parameters.Description: Total number of ad requests on this site that this user has made

parameters.Name: site_ad_vw
parameters.Description: Total number of ads on this site that this user has viewed

parameters.Name: site_ad_vw_eng
parameters.Description: Total number of ads on this site that this user has viewed while engaged

parameters.Name: site_ad_clk
parameters.Description: Total number of ads on this site that this user has clicked

parameters.Name: vis_id
parameters.Description: Site user ID, generated by either the device or Ad.js, stored in local storage

parameters.Name: vis_page_vw
parameters.Description: Total number of page views on this site that this user has seen in this visit

parameters.Name: vis_ad_req
parameters.Description: Total number of ad requests on this site that this user has made in this visit

parameters.Name: vis_ad_vw
parameters.Description: Total number of ads on this site that this user has viewed in this visit

parameters.Name: vis_ad_vw_eng
parameters.Description: Total number of ads on this site that this user has viewed while engaged in this visit

parameters.Name: vis_ad_clk
parameters.Description: Total number of ads on this site that this user has clicked in this visit

parameters.Name: page_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the page request

parameters.Name: page_load_ms
parameters.Description: The number of milliseconds before the page was loaded

parameters.Name: page_dur
parameters.Description: The number of milliseconds the page was displaying

parameters.Name: noscript
parameters.Description: Whether this ad has script available

parameters.Name: tz
parameters.Description: The time zone according to the client

parameters.Name: screen_w
parameters.Description: The width of the device screen

parameters.Name: screen_h
parameters.Description: The height of the device screen

parameters.Name: vp_x
parameters.Description: The X position of the browser window at the time of the request

parameters.Name: vp_y
parameters.Description: The Y position of the ad slot at the time of the request

parameters.Name: vp_w
parameters.Description: The width of the browser window

parameters.Name: vp_h
parameters.Description: The height of the browser window

parameters.Name: userid
parameters.Description: The user ID
